title: Two years without playing and something happened...
body: So I was away from League of Legends for two years and I just logged in again. My username and password were the same, but I found when I verified my email a different, random email address that I've never seen before was assigned to my account. All of the champions, runes and skins I've bought are locked again, I have no match history and I'm level 10 (used to be 30). Am I missing something here? Or do I just have a bad memory?

replies.body:
We don't reset accounts or remove content for inactivity, so I'm inclined to agree with *Lew* here that you likely logged into a different account than the one you had previously accessed.

You can use the [*forgot username*](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/forgot-username) tool to see if it will send you the correct username tied to your email. Let me know if you have any questions.
It sounds like you might have logged in to the wrong account.
